children.value: The checklist result can be specified with a path to a JSON or YAML file in the

folder)
and if not found then from a classic fetch (

folder).
In both case the checkresult can be in JSON or YAML format.
Checklist result from a YAML URL :
Checklist result from a JSON URL :

You can inject check result directly in the component
with a YAML syntax in the

props.code:
::ppw-checklist-result-static
---
result:
    id: root
    name: I am root
    status: KO
    children:
    - id: step1
      name: This is step 1
      icon: "mdi:file-arrow-up-down-outline"
      status: OK
    - id: step1
      name: This is step 2
      status: KO
---
::

children.value:
Show the root node or start at its children.
When

props.:result: {"id":"root","name":"I am root","status":"KO","children":[{"id":"step1","name":"This is step children 1","icon":"mdi:file-arrow-up-down-outline","status":"OK"},{"id":"step2","name":"This is step children 2","status":"KO"}]}

props.code:
::ppw-checklist-result-static
---
show_root: true
result:
    id: root
    name: I am root
    status: KO
    children:
    - id: step1
      name: This is step children 1
      icon: "mdi:file-arrow-up-down-outline"
      status: OK
    - id: step2
      name: This is step children 2
      status: KO
---
::

props.:result: {"id":"root","name":"I am root","status":"KO","children":[{"id":"step1","name":"This is step children 1","icon":"mdi:file-arrow-up-down-outline","status":"OK"},{"id":"step2","name":"This is step children 2","status":"KO"}]}

props.code:
::ppw-checklist-result-static
---
show_root: false
result:
    id: root
    name: I am root
    status: KO
    children:
    - id: step1
      name: This is step children 1
      icon: "mdi:file-arrow-up-down-outline"
      status: OK
    - id: step2
      name: This is step children 2
      status: KO
---
::

::ppw-checklist-result-static
---
hide_modes_selector: true
result:
    status: KO
    children:
    - id: step1
      name: This is step 1
      icon: "mdi:file-arrow-up-down-outline"
      status: OK
    - id: step2
      name: This is step 2
      status: KO
---
::

::ppw-checklist-result-static
---
hide_modes_selector: false
result:
    status: KO
    children:
    - id: step1
      name: This is step 1
      icon: "mdi:file-arrow-up-down-outline"
      status: OK
    - id: step2
      name: This is step 2
      status: KO
---
::

children.value: You can set view mode with the
mode the minimum info is displayed.

props.code:
::ppw-checklist-result-static
---
class: h-96
mode: simple
result:
    status: KO
    children:
    - id: step1
      name: This is step 1
      icon: "mdi:file-arrow-up-down-outline"
      status: OK
    - id: step2
      name: This is step 2
      status: KO
---
::

::ppw-checklist-result-static
---
class: h-96
mode: simple
result:
    status: KO
    children:
    - id: step1
      name: This is step 1
      icon: "mdi:file-arrow-up-down-outline"
      status: OK
    - id: step2
      name: This is step 2
      status: KO
---
::

::ppw-checklist-result-static
---
mode: basic
result:
    status: KO
    children:
    - id: step1
      name: This is step 1
      icon: "mdi:file-arrow-up-down-outline"
      status: OK
    - id: step2
      name: This is step 2
      status: KO
---
::

::ppw-checklist-result-static
---
mode: datav
result:
    status: KO
    children:
    - id: step1
      name: This is step 1
      icon: "mdi:file-arrow-up-down-outline"
      status: OK
    - id: step2
      name: This is step 2
      status: KO
---
::

::ppw-checklist-result-static
---
mode: nonconformity
result:
    status: KO
    children:
    - id: step1
      name: This is step 1
      icon: "mdi:file-arrow-up-down-outline"
      status: OK
    - id: step2
      name: This is step 2
      status: KO
---
::all

children.value: Each node can have a result prop with the values
value will be inferred with those rules :
encountered status of the children (respecting the order
if not set use curernt node status if any
if not set use the parent status if any
if not set, set it to

props.code:
::ppw-checklist-result-static
---
mode: nonconformity
result:
    status: KO
    children:
    - id: step1
      name: This is step 1
      icon: "mdi:file-arrow-up-down-outline"
      status: OK
    - id: step2
      name: This is step 2
      status: KO
---
::all

children.value: show only a given tree node
open the tree node at a specified location
to include part from other file

html.dark .shiki span {color: var(--shiki-dark) !important;background: var(--shiki-dark-bg) !important;font-style: var(--shiki-dark-font-style) !important;font-weight: var(--shiki-dark-font-weight) !important;text-decoration: var(--shiki-dark-text-decoration) !important;}
